mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) AS totalCount, ifnull(SUM(taa.Balance),0) AS totalBalance, ifnull(SUM(taa.UnBalance),0) AS totalUnBalance, ifnull(SUM(taa.SettAmount),0) AS totalSettAmount FROM t_agent_info tai JOIN t_agent_account taa ON tai.AgentId = taa.AgentId WHERE taa.Status = 1;
